content.speaker: gump
content.text: Uh...Hi, I'm moving into this house.

content.speaker: nayomi
content.text: This house? Wow, nobody has taken care of this house for like 10 years, it's a mess.

content.speaker: nayomi
content.text: Well you have a lot of work ahead of you!

content.speaker: nayomi
content.text: I hope you brought some tools because last time I checked everything was broken.

content.speaker: nayomi
content.text: ...You don't have any tools do you...

content.speaker: nayomi
content.text: Well come visit later and you can borrow my drill. You will need one if you are going to fix this mailbox.

content.speaker: nayomi
content.text: I live in the house to the left of yours.

content.speaker: nayomi
content.text: But first I think that you should see inside. You probably don't realize the work ahead of you...
